neighbors.name: Damon Cox & Jannllie Cox
neighbors.claims: Damon B. Cox and his spouse Jannllie Cox reside on a property along County Road 900 South in Cloverdale ([source](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/greencastle-in/floyd-decker-11410884)). In 2022, Damon Cox appeared before the Putnam County Board of Zoning Appeals to request a variance for a temporary second dwelling while constructing a new home on the property; the variance was approved ([source](https://irp.cdn-website.com/238c8e41/files/uploaded/Approved+March+Minutes.pdf)). No public statements regarding renewable energy development were located in available records.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private resident; petitioner for personal zoning variance

approach_recommendations.engage: Address concerns about home resale value and views via visual buffers, acknowledging his recent investment in building a new home on the property.

citations.claim: Damon B. Cox and his spouse Jannllie Cox reside on a property along County Road 900 South in Cloverdale
citations.title: Obituary for Floyd S. Decker

citations.claim: In 2022, Damon Cox appeared before the Putnam County Board of Zoning Appeals to request a variance for a temporary second dwelling while constructing a new home on the property; the variance was approved
citations.title: Putnam County Board of Zoning Appeals Minutes

neighbors.name: James P. Payne
neighbors.claims: James P. Payne purchased the residential property at 5453 E County Road 900 S in Cloverdale in May 2019 ([source](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/5453-E-County-Road-900-S-Cloverdale-IN-46120/110330643_zpid/)). No record of Payne taking a public position on local development issues was found in news or meeting archives ([source](https://indianaeconomicdigest.net/MobileContent/Default/Major-Indiana-News/Article/Putnam-County-Commissioners-set-moratorium-for-solar-farms-and-more/-3/5308/120492)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Newer property owner; no public office found

approach_recommendations.engage: Provide assurances regarding noise and screening to protect the quiet enjoyment of his recently purchased property.

citations.claim: James P. Payne purchased the residential property at 5453 E County Road 900 S in Cloverdale in May 2019
citations.title: 5453 E County Road 900 S Property Details

citations.claim: No record of Payne taking a public position on local development issues was found in news or meeting archives
citations.title: Putnam County Commissioners set moratorium for solar farms

neighbors.name: Carl D. Grove & Marilyn S. Grove
neighbors.claims: Carl D. Grove and Marilyn S. Grove are long-time residents of the area; Carl Grove appears in local records as early as 1957 regarding school district consolidation ([source](https://newspapers.library.in.gov/cgi-bin/indiana?a=d&d=TDB19570425-01.1.1)). Marilyn Grove has been active in the local faith community and is a known resident of Cloverdale ([source](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/greencastle-in/ellen-cash-8950585)). No evidence was found of the family speaking at public meetings regarding recent solar development proposals ([source](https://indianaeconomicdigest.net/MobileContent/Default/Major-Indiana-News/Article/Putnam-County-Area-Plan-Commission-recommends-denying-solar-rezone-of-1-200-acres/-3/5308/115778)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Long-time resident; no recent public office

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with respect for their long tenure; discuss farmland preservation and drainage to honor their legacy.

citations.claim: Carl Grove appears in local records as early as 1957 regarding school district consolidation
citations.title: The Daily Banner 25 April 1957

citations.claim: Marilyn Grove has been active in the local faith community and is a known resident of Cloverdale
citations.title: Obituary for Ellen Joan Cash

citations.claim: No evidence was found of the family speaking at public meetings regarding recent solar development proposals
citations.title: Putnam County Area Plan Commission recommends denying solar rezone

neighbors.name: State Of Indiana
neighbors.claims: The State of Indiana owns property along County Road 900 S, likely associated with the Department of Natural Resources and the nearby Lieber State Recreation Area/Cagles Mill Lake ([source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cagles_Mill_Lake)). The property is classified as exempt/state-owned land ([source](https://www.loopnet.com/property/8407-e-county-road-900-s-cloverdale-in-46120/18133-671325300023000010/)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate with IDNR regarding setbacks and environmental impact on nearby state recreation areas.

citations.claim: The State of Indiana owns property along County Road 900 S, likely associated with the Department of Natural Resources and the nearby Lieber State Recreation Area/Cagles Mill Lake
citations.title: Cagles Mill Lake

citations.claim: The property is classified as exempt/state-owned land
